root.name: Avencast: Rise of the Mage
root.description: Avencast: Rise of the Mage is an action role-playing game only on the PC. It was developed by ClockStone Software and published by Lighthouse Interactive. Features More than 50 spells.150 Unique Items to be found or bought.Unique Action Combat Development Avencast began as a Diablo clone while also taking ideas form other popular games in the genre. It was the company's first game and was under development for close to four years. The team had little to no formal background in game development and only consisted of a few people. Release The game was released with a moderate reception, IGN gave it a 7.0 while Gamespot awarded it a 7.5.
